title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 25.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 25.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

To prevent or reduce the theft of motor vehicles prior to
their titling, many motor vehicle manufacturers have been providing
certificates of origin rather than statements of origin. The American

Association of Motor Vehicle Administrators strongly supports this effort. The
requirements for certificates of origin contained herein are consistent with
the recommendations of that association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
25.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
